website_summaries.verdict: If you need an alternative style that doubles as an outdoor area rug, this is an acceptable choice.
pros: can be used indoors or outdoors
A unique array of colors and patterns complement a variety of decor
cons: May be difficult to lie flat
Thin and not as comfortable on the feet as some others
No color varieties to pick from

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an indoor/outdoor area rug for my gazebo. Saw this online and ordered it, the colors and price were right. I think it looks great with my yellow swing and red butterfly pillows. The pattern is also good for concealing dirt, which is very much needed for an outdoor application. I am very satisfied with quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: DWD

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed! This rug has bled all over from rain ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed! This rug has bled all over from rain and being wet. I'm hoping is hasn't stained my new concrete patio - but I can't move it alone. I tried to contact them to return/refund and no response. This rug should not be used outdoors - it holds a tremendous amount of water and takes a long time to dry. One star is even to much.
customer_reviews.author: VSchieck

customer_reviews.title: NOT An Indoor/outdoor rug!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this for outdoor use. Despite what is stated about this rug, it is not for outdoor use. It soaks up moisture like a sponge and grows mold because it does not dry out well. I am going to have to throw it away! I am out a nice chunk of money! 😖
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for outside but with the constant rain we had in the summer I just kept it inside. I now use it for underneath our kitchen table and it woks great! The color is nice and it has held up GREAT for our dogs constantly running and chewing bones on it. This rug is very durable and I love that it has rubber on the bottom to keep it from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: The Bishops

customer_reviews.title: Great rug except that it's loop pile
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug... except for one thing, which is totally my fault. There are two varieties of this rug, this one has loop pile - not so great if you have cats. I should have gotten the other one (the Strata Caravan Medallion) which has cut pile. Live and learn... And BTW, the color in this picture is not accurate. The background is much more gold than gray - more like the picture in the Strata Caravan listing.
customer_reviews.author: Eco Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go under dining table and by the time I was going to use it, it didn't work. So I used it in my kitchen, cause I hate grease and water from sink on my floor plus for safety to not slip. It also works on fatigue from standing to long on food prep or cooking. I've purchased these Mohawk rugs before and never had a problem inside or out. Truly a non slip even for runners. When they get dirty, I just take them out side drape over my fence spot clean and pressure wash. They dry fairly quick.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Haase

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rug, But Unraveling...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this rug. I purchased the 5'x8' size. The colors are vibrant and the design is beautiful and exactly what I was looking for. Unfortunately, after less than two months after purchase and one month of use (We actually didn't take it out of its wrapper and put it down for a few weeks after receiving it) it has started unraveling in places. I understand that the rug didn't cost much compared to higher quality rugs of it's size, but I definitely thought it would last longer than two months before it started unraveling. I would have given it one star if it wasn't such a beautiful rug.
customer_reviews.author: TjP

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors and design
customer_reviews.text: We put this rug on top of carpet by our wood stove hearth to help protect the carpeting from the bits of wood chips and dirt that come with using wood logs and give the pets a comfy spot to lay on by the stove. Love the colors and design, it's easy to clean and vacuum. It's a great value, would recommend this rug!
customer_reviews.author: Birog

customer_reviews.title: NOT an outdoor carpet
customer_reviews.text: This rug looks exactly as presented. The colors are true and they are the reason I bought it for my deck. The colors tied everything together perfectly. The problem is that this is NOT an outdoor carpet. It has a rubber backing and when it rains the rug gets soggy with water and will not dry. The rain just sits on top of the rubber backing. I have to lift it (with help) over a railing to get it to drain, and I'm guessing that when it's wet it weighs 100 lbs. I would recommend this for indoor use without hesitation. I would warn against it for outdoors and I think advertising it as indoor/outdoor is very misleading. .
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Flemington

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors are throughout this rug. After walking on this area rug for over a month in a high traffic area with a 50lb dog that likes to do dance spins on it, the carpet looks as good as the day it came into my home. For some crazy reason, the rug seems to repel dog hair! My other area rug was a dog hair magnet so I was happily surprised to find I do not have to do a twice a day vacuuming. You will need a double-sided carpet tape to keep the corner edges down on a wood or laminate floor but there are no more issues with the corner edges anymore. Highly recommend this rug.
customer_reviews.author: E. Eike

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR OUTDOOR USE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intention to use it outdoors as a patio rug BUT it is NOT AN OUTDOOR RUG at all! If you put it outside it will likely get ruined quickly, especially if you are located in a rainy or humid place. This rug is 100% indoor and would only retain water if placed outdoors. That being said, it is a beautiful rug and pretty soft! We have decided to use it indoors and found another option for outdoors. ONLY BUY FOR INDOOR USE. WILL NOT LAST OUTDOORS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors but very cheap rug.
customer_reviews.text: If this wasn't for my patio it would be going back. I live in a small town so it isn't easy to send a large item back. It's very thin, it's missing some of the yarn/string/thread what ever you call it. Don't know how flat it will lay. They should have rolled this thin rug around a larger tubing so it wouldn't get small creases in it that may never straitened out. Will never buy from this company again... it would be okay maybe if you only spent $10.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen B.

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff Rug
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rug as a "buy again" to replace the original one that was the victim of an un-housetrained dog. I loved the original and was pleased to have the chance to buy it again. I waited until this week to put it out as the pesky critter has returned home. This one is a crappy, poorly done replication that is not worth your money. The bold patterns are shrunken down or redrawn in such a manner as to be laughable. So very disappointing and misleading. It may be too late for me to return, but I plan to if I can.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Quality rug, reliable manufacturer, I like the pattern
customer_reviews.text: This rug cost me $60 it's shipped in two days and arrived on time. Basically I just really like the pattern, it's on a honeygold wood floor and it looks great. The quality seems fine it does not move around it does not require an under mat unless you want the Kush otherwise you don't need to worry about it moving around it's 5x8. Rugs are kind of a personal preference but this manufacturer seems to do quality work I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: For Camping
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use in front of our tent when we're camping to keep dirt out and add some 'glamping' feel to it. Works Excellent. High quality and I don't hesitate to put it on our deck when we return home. This is an indoor outdoor rug, meaning if it gets soaked it won't ruin it. But it's not waterproof. If this thing gets wet it holds water like a sponge and has to be dried out.
customer_reviews.author: RedHeadedNinja

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but not dog friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful rug and I purchased it explicitly as I have two dogs, it will be easy to clean and had a short nap. If you have dogs be prepared for their nails to snag in the loops. I have two dogs, between 24-30 lbs, and both of their nails are kept trimmed, however when they walk across the carpet you can hear their nails catching. Some of the loops then are snagged and pulled up. I am having to use scissors to cut trim the snags off. Again if it wasn't for this is give it high marks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug but...
customer_reviews.text: The rug is soft and beautiful and looks perfect with my patio set. However, it really isn’t an outdoor rug - it gets soaked if it rains and took a couple days to dry out. I’m hoping it won’t eventually mold. Disappointed but keeping it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: PATIO RUG
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my covered patio to put under my rockers because they slide on the concrete. The rug is good quality for the patio and looks good. I would have given it five stars but the displayed color is totally not what I expected. It has more of a golden tone with more yellow than I like. Because of all the other qualities, I decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Saucer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Rug.
customer_reviews.text: The rug was horrible. The quality of the rug was awful. It did not lay flat on the floor, was not a true square. Couldn't get it straight with the lines of my wood floor. The rug I received was not the rug I ordered, Amazon replaced it with something else and did not let me know of the change. Very unhappy with quality of rug and the fact it wasn't what I wanted. The colors in the replacement rug do not match my decor, the colors are dark and gloomy along with being of poor quality. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hanstein

customer_reviews.title: Not for OUTDOORS!
customer_reviews.text: This rug should NOT be listed as an indoor/OUTDOOR rug. The first time it rained the rug became soaked and does not dry out. It gets extremely heavy when wet and I could barely lift it to hang to dry. I had it on a wood deck but I had to take it off because it is so wet and heavy that it runs the wood! On the plus side, beautiful rug at a great price. Just use it INSIDE!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: I love this rug
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug, it's actually the second time I've ordered it in 3 years. My patio is covered but water and sun do take a toll on the floor. This rug has held up well to the elements and 2 German Shepherds. It has faded but that's it. I ordered the second rug because I saw it at a really good price and I want to make sure I have it when my current one finally does wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: THEY STATE THAT IT IS OUTDOOR, BUT IT WILL NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS RUG. I PURCHASED IT FOR OUR DECK. IT RAINED AND I ASSUMED THAT IT WOULD DRY QUICKLY. THREE DAYS LATER I AM STILL VACUUMING WATER OUT OF IT. IF IT WERE A TRUE INDOOR OUTDOOR CARPET, IT SHOULD NOT HAVE A RUBBER BACKING, ALLOW FOR DRAINAGE SO THE CARPET DOESN'T GET MOLDY, AND THE SURFACE BELOW DOESN'T ROT.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT <3!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this carpet! I have it indoors on tile and smile everytime I look at it. The subtle colors and pattern are perfect for my taste. It was a great value, albeit a little small for what I needed but it works. I can't wait to get the patio together so I can move this one outdoors and buy a larger one for in the house. The bigger one is about 3.5x more but because I love this one so much I am willing to spend the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Do not use outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is definitely not an outdoor rug. I even called the manufacturer and they confirmed that the description for this rug is incorrect- The backing of the rug does not allow water to pass through it! The rug is currently so heavy from last nights rains that we cannot even lift it to drape rug over railing of deck to allow rug to dry. You would think that with all the reviews over the past 3 years (which I failed to read-my mistake!) that the description for this item would have been updated! One star is even to high of a rating for this item- Very disappointed in product! Amazon customer service has been very helpful in arranging refund!
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: Product quality down
customer_reviews.text: We replaced the rug we had purchased from Mohawk 6 years ago, which held up for us in all ways except for fading in the sun. We have had our new rug less than 2 months and had a terrible foot long piece pull out from the rug. Looking on the back, it is clear the backing is of lesser quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soggy mess!
customer_reviews.text: I stupidly did not read the reviews before I bought this indoor/“outdoor” rug. This is no outdoor rug. Like others said, it holds gallons of water. I suspect here in the northeast this thing may never dry out! I gave it two stars because it’s the exact colors I was looking for and very soft. Unfortunately I don’t think it will last long in my deck before it begins to get moldy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Spairana

customer_reviews.title: NOT suitable for Outside
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased to place on our deck. We placed this rug outside during memorial day weekend, 5-25-19 and it was originally gorgeous. However, after three days of rain last week (6-12-19 through 6-14-19), the rugs were ruined. DO NOT PURCHASE this rug if you plan to use it OUTSIDE. Please see my before and after pics.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The rug came right away. The colors are bright and wonderful. We love it!!!!!!! Okay now after using this rug, we still love the looks but it is falling apart. Do not buy it. We don't even know why it is falling apart. It is not happening when vacuuming. We just keep seeing unraveling happening for no apparent reason. No longer pretty but embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is exactly as shown in the pictures. It remains to be seen how long it will last in direct sunlight during the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Cat

customer_reviews.title: Unless you live in the desert, not an outdoor rug.
customer_reviews.text: This IS NOT suitable for outdoors. Every time it rains, I have to squeegee this rug off. It holds the water and basically never dries. Very attractive and well made, but should not be labeled for outdoor. I will have to pull it before it rots my wooden deck. And my deck has plenty of room between each slat for the water to run through.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the pet owners out there!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. The quality is great and the design is super cute in person. Is more tan in person. I bought this because my dogs kept wrecking area rugs in my living room. If there is a dog accident on the rug now I can spray it with some nature's miracle, hose it off, and leave it on the deck to air dry....sooooo convenient. I will never buy another normal area rug as long as I have dogs in the house!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is really pretty and large for the price point. I bought it for my living room that has all wood floors and it looks great. The picture makes it look more silvery gray, but it actually is more of a tan/champagne color. Definitely recommend it at this price point. Quality is decent, and it arrived quickly and neatly packaged in a thick, clear, plastic wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Mesia

customer_reviews.title: Holds water like a sponge............false statement in the product description.
customer_reviews.text: The product description states "Our unique marine backing application on our nylon outdoor rugs allows the water to pass through the rug instead of absorbing it, much like the carpet you find on boats." which is completely false. We placed the rug on our outdoor deck and it was rained on for about 30 minutes. Two days later it is still soaking wet. No water passes through.
customer_reviews.author: Billybob

customer_reviews.title: Not really an outdoor rug.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous rug and I bought it for my outside deck. The design and color is amazing but when it rains it is a soggy mess. I can not use it for the purpose I bought it for, it is now stored until I can think of a place to use it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: I love this Rug!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful rug, and such a great deal for the price. I'm very pleased with the feel. I'm redoing my patio and this is a huge part of my redo!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in great condition but was darker in appearance than the images show. It also didn't lay flat on the floor and had a slight wrinkled look to it. We were disappointed in the product and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean08

customer_reviews.title: So I just wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointing.. Listed as indoor / outdoor... I put outdoor... It rained... it is soaking wet, heavy and caused considerable water to stay under it and therefore, on my deck. To hard for me to repackage to send back. So I just wasted my money. Definitely not an outdoor carpet..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far So good.
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty. Love the colors. I'm not sure how it does in rain yet. Hopefully since it's labeled as indoor/outdoor rug, it'll be okay. I'll be able to speak on the value of it after a little time since I've had it only 7 days.
customer_reviews.author: eyeshy

customer_reviews.title: Very addictive
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my covered patio and have received so many compliments on it. From the time I placed on the floor it has laid flat no curling corners. Very nice backing and the surface is soft and ease to run a vacuum over.
customer_reviews.author: P Parmley

customer_reviews.title: NOT for outdoor use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT for outdoor use!! This rug has a rubber backing and it never dries out after getting wet. I use it on a protected patio and it is constantly wet and slimy-feeling. It is advertised as indoor/outdoor but I would caution against exposing it to moisture. I’ve had many outdoor rugs and this is the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Looks great outside. Matches my decor and furniture. I've read other reviews of the rain and how it doesn't dry well. Hasn't rained on mine yet but it looks lovely. Very soft under my bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Castlee

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug. So pretty and the colors are perfect. Not bright and not muted..just beautiful colors. The grayish blues, rust, oranges, browns...all colors work well together. Just beautiful
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this rug. My mom suggested an indoor/outdoor carpet for under my kitchen table since I have 2 toddlers +my husband and they all like to leave messes behind. This rug hides dirt well when I can't get to vacuum right away and I love the colors. If you didn't know play-doh comes in most of these colors so when your 3 year old grinds it into the rug then at least it matches lol. For the price I don't care either because I would happily buy another one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Indoor outdoor carpet
customer_reviews.text: Love this carpet but it does get quite squishy for a few days after it rains. Very pretty! Comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Pope

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor rug.
customer_reviews.text: This rug is thin with a rubber backing. I wouldn’t use it outdoors, it wouldn’t dry out fast if rained on. I love it indoors, the corners stay flat and don’t try to curl up, and the whole rug stays put even with kids rolling and playing on it. The designs and colors are beautiful. The vacuum cleaner cleans it up, and it’s heavy enough that it doesn’t try to suck it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Holds water. I don’t know why they would sell this for outdoor use. Only goid thing about it is that it does not get hot when the sun beats down on it like some other outdoor rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Great look, heavy duty. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Heck of a rug for the money. Looks great for a printed rug, cleans up with the vac super easy. Even when the dog lays on it and leaves GSD hair, it comes right off. Ends do not curl up like cheaper rugs. Nice edges. This is more of an industrial rug that would be good if you have lots of traffic, kids or commercial space.
customer_reviews.author: Lenka

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, warm tan in color.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice rug, very attractive, true to size. Note that the colors, which appeared more muted on my screen, are of the warm tan, turquoise, burnt oranges variety. I was shooting for tan so it is wonderful for me. It does not have shades of grey. It is a little wavy when you first put it down, but has enough weight that I am confident it will settle nicely in a short amount of time. Fairly low odor, but does have the new rug rubbery smell.
customer_reviews.author: WI Girl!

customer_reviews.title: Not an all-weather item
customer_reviews.text: Though this was advertised as indoor-outdoor rug, it was certainly a mistake to use it out of doors. I am sure it would hold up fine in an enclosed porch area, but I used it on a deck and it was a disaster. I thought it would be weatherproof--it soaked up rain like a sponge. Other than that, it was an attractive, well made item. I think the description was lacking in this respect.
customer_reviews.author: donna pallante

customer_reviews.title: NOT for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: This carpet is beautiful! It’s soft, vivid colors. BUT it is NOT for outdoor use, and that is what I purchased it for. It holds the water for DAYS! I had to remove it from my deck for fear of it literally rotting my wood, that is how wet the carpet gets.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful large area rug for my deck. the colors are vibrant and varied so this rug goes with almost anything: umbrellas, deck furniture and ties all the colors together.
customer_reviews.author: newgranny52

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this to use on my screened in porch. Upon arrival it fits perfectly in my sewing room/office. I love the bright colors, great for a area rug.
customer_reviews.author: sewmoore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rug! Great Price! Don't you just love Amazon! :)
customer_reviews.text: Seriously! I shopped a couple of stores for rugs and the prices and look didn't compare to this one. Thank you Amazon! This rug looks even better in person! We love it! The vintage, softly faded look is so nice! Don't shop around like I did! Have this beauty delivered to your door! Can't beat it! :)
customer_reviews.author: eatsleeprun

customer_reviews.title: Snags easily
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty rug, looks nice in our house. Only real drawback is it snags very easily and you will have littles tuffs off the rug. I suspect it will have to be replaced sooner than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: leafygirl

customer_reviews.title: Rug was poorly constructed....
customer_reviews.text: Rug was poorly made & would not lay flat....numerous wrinkles which would not lay down. Rug a trip trap. It obviously was a second that never should have been sold or else buyer should have been alerted to issues. Will be given to Goodwill!
customer_reviews.author: shoeperson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good price!
customer_reviews.text: Put on my covered front porch. Looks beautiful and brings some color to the porch. Good price compared to other ones I looked at. Packaged well for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Haystack

customer_reviews.title: The pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The pup loves it. Bought this specifically to cover the concrete outside the back door of our sun room. Every day in this hot Texas sun, the pup would come to the door to come in and lift her little feet up and down because the concrete would burn her paws. This was the perfect size and is so comfy and cushy that she lies down on it most of the time instead of coming right in. I don't mind walking out there barefooted now either. Feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Just don't vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great and I like the design. It is an indoor/outdoor rug...my goal was price and standing up to pets in the short term. The dogs, cats, and bunny have had no effect, which is great! We are using it in the living room and it looks fine. I didn't expect it to last forever...however, vacuuming it is a nightmare. No matter how high I raise the vacuum, the rug snags and wraps around the vacuum thing. Not much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Bush

customer_reviews.title: Not an outdoor rug at all
customer_reviews.text: This rug was listed as an outdoor rug. It is more like a cheap indoor rug. It holds water for days after it rains so in no way does it drain like it says.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Alexa Medallion Area Rug
customer_reviews.text: Area rug looks beautiful and matches my Sky Blue ( Turquoise) sofa perfectly. I will be purchasing a rug pad as this rug is somewhat thin and I have porcelain floors.
customer_reviews.author: njucam

customer_reviews.title: Great rug for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I expected. Rich colors, easy to clean and is a compliment to just about any room decor. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug two years ago from Sears for our new house. Our dog ruined it and we really liked the color pattern. Saw it on Amazon for $30 less but this rug has so many flaws. It came with pulls and spots where the yarn is missing. A few of the threads have gotten caught in the vacuum machine making it look worse. Again, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors and size of this rug. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This was going to be and outdoor rug, but the color and texture was so beautiful ended up putting in my living room. I get many compliments. Great value for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Erika V

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The rug won't lay flat. Maybe it's sewn wrong? It's also rough fabric. I've gotten better quality for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We have some stains in the daughters room that we have had 'professionally' cleaned 3-4 times in the past 10 months. Not ready to replace carpet yet,so we bought the rug. Looks great. Great colors. Fits perfect. Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR OUTDOORS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY FOR OUTDOOR USE! This rug is in no way meant to be outdoor. It literally takes days to dry out after a rain. It’s terrible - a total waste of money as there is nothing else I can do with it anywhere else in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fox

customer_reviews.title: Durable, beautiful, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in our office under the kids' craft table for about 6 months. It looks beautiful and hides messes well, as well as being easy to clean. So far it has stood up nicely to 2 kids, 2 office chairs on wheels and a dog.
customer_reviews.author: afostermom

customer_reviews.title: Good color but.....
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking rug, color little darker than picture. The problem is that it has ripples through rug and it does not lay flat. Seems defective.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Mohawk indoor/outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: When I first recd. the rug, I liked how it looked very much. It's listed as indoor/outdoor though. After rain, it does not dry quickly, it seems to be wet all the time and the colors sort of ran as if it's not colorfast. The price was reasonable, but it's only been on my deck for 4 mos. and it's probably not going to last 2 seasons.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a while now and the wrinkles are still there! We have steamed, used heavy stuff on it and tried all of the tricks to get them out. The colors are really nice though. I did call Amazon and they offered to exchange but it was too big for me to move the furniture and repackage! Don’t buy it unless you don’t mind permanent wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not lay flat
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected...no matter what I tried I couldn’t get this rug to lay flat! It’s cheaply made but for the price I paid for it I can’t complain to much.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyUnique

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is beautiful in person! I have the larger size on my patio and used one each of the 5X7 for our cool deck by the pool and umbrella and one under our gazebo. They look great. The price is unbelievable. I paired turquoise colored sling chairs and orange and blue outdoor pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Patti 415

customer_reviews.title: Indoor Outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: Love 💕 love this rug! Beautiful and even better looking in person. I didn’t realize it was an indoor outdoor rug but it is perfect and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: cecelia cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Colors are just as they look on the website - beautiful in my room! Rug is not thick or plush but that is what I needed since I have to clean it often d/t elderly pup who has accidents! Took a little while and some furniture placement to get it to lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty area rug at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Love the pop of color this rug added to our downstairs area needed something easy to clean in a high traffic area along with dogs and this did the trick. Great area rug for the price and the colors make it easy to accent!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rug
customer_reviews.text: Love the patterns and colors of this rug. Works perfectly in my large living room and very versatile for inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Sig

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors !
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this rug! Soft easy to vacuum! Love the colors !! I use it outside so I am happy it seems to hold up great !
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: vibrant
customer_reviews.text: it's EXACTLY as pictured! It's absolutely gorgeous!. The colors!! It's lightweight and easy to clean. I have it on my front porch. One of my favorite things at my house!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is darker than pic
customer_reviews.text: The colors shown in the picture, to me, is light & bright. I just received my rug & the colors are alot darker. And the bright colors, aren't bright. Instead, just a darker version of the bright. BUT...I love it even more b/c of this!!!! I was hesitant about purchasing b/c of how bright the colors were. I loved the design so it was a must. Color is different --BUT I LOVE IT EVEN MORE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: colors are true to picture.
customer_reviews.text: The color combinations ....we used it with our patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Benge

customer_reviews.title: Really livens up dining area
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an indoor-outdoor area rug for my dining area that had red and teal and beige. This rug meets my needs, appears to be of good quality, and helps liven up the space.
customer_reviews.author: Jean S.

customer_reviews.title: Think Out of the Box for These Rugs!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug to use in my garage. I wanted to set up an ironing area that was cheery and pretty! The garage floor needs a facelift, but, that's another project! This inexpensive yet sturdy rug fits the bill for now. I can leave the ironing board up with the clothes rack nearby and out of the house! Everything stays nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, and easy to clean. Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love this carpet! Has a great backing, well made, and doesn't seem to show dirt.
customer_reviews.author: isla hanley

customer_reviews.title: The most gorgeous rug.
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this rug....I could literally throw out all the furniture (I have red sofa and chair in the office my new rug resides) and just stare at this beautiful rug. It's gorgeous, people. Soooo gorgeous. You won't regret picking out this one. You'll fall in love with yourself the rug and life with this in your room.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa C. Samsock

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is beautiful. It's way brighter than shown. Just gorgeous. I have one of this brand already and it holds up in our busy household. This one really spruced up our living room. Fun and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: rmkd

customer_reviews.title: not an outside rug
customer_reviews.text: rubber backing doesn't allow moisture through so how it can be used outside is a mystery
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schultz

customer_reviews.title: The colors are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: We used the rug for our deck, under the table. Very soft although the edge binding is a little stiff. I think it will soften in time. The colors are spot on with the picture.
customer_reviews.author: steve smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I caught this rug on sale. I love it! The colors are much prettier in person. Ties my room together really well.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Pickens

customer_reviews.title: Is really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Is really good for the price. My only concern is that it is considered an outdoor carpet. I purchased two. One is on a covered porch and the other is on an adjacent deck that is not covered. It seems to retain alot of water for an outdoor carpet. Other outdoor specific carpets I have bought seemed to dry out much quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug! After 3 years of a family of 5 and 2 dogs I ordered the same exact rug again I like it so much! It's great on slippery floors and it doesn't need anything to hold it in place or keep it from slipping on my tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: A little overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: The colors are a LOT darker than picture-- kinda overwhelming... wish they were more subdued colors!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy A. Rohde

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is so beautiful, the colors are so great. Love it. Definitely looking for more rugs with this company
customer_reviews.author: lacerlou32

customer_reviews.title: The cost was nice for a rug as nice as this.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rug. Very nice!!! The size chosen was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hart

customer_reviews.title: This rug is absolutely equisite!
customer_reviews.text: Just a beautiful inexpensive solution to make my room feel exquisite.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Bonsai novice

customer_reviews.title: Rug belongs in door not outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price excellent size however when it rains outside it takes for ever to get the water off the rug and for it to dry. This would be a better purchase as an indoor rug.
customer_reviews.author: Juel Darden

customer_reviews.title: Not an outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: The rug itself is beautiful but it’s advertised as indoor/outdoor. After the first rain the rug was SOAKED and there was no where for the water to drain. I had to return it because I bought it for my deck. It would be an amazing value for an indoor room.
customer_reviews.author: michelle cohen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love thos rug the colors work perfectly in my house! I only wish it were little more shaggy under my feet .
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Orr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rug , looks just like picture
customer_reviews.text: It’s really good in my great room ,,, very happy I brought it
customer_reviews.author: Doris Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Not good for pet homes
customer_reviews.text: I have dogs and i have a huge amount of carpet loops that keep getting pulled. Love the rug color and style. But it wont last much longer, and it wasnt priced good for the low quality
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this rug. It rolled out flat, I've had it about 2 months now and it's still perfect. The colors are vibrant and match everything. It's not thick, but it's got a little cushion to it. And when my boyfriend spills on it, you can hardly tell.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

product_meta.title: Mohawk Home Multi Alexa Medallion, 5'x8'
product_meta.description: Size:5'x8'The Mohawk Home rugs and mats are perfect for festive spaces and are sure to make a splash. These meticulously made rugs and mats feature synthetic fibers known for durability, and resiliency against matting and crushing caused from every day wear-and-tear, preventing stains, fading, mold and mildew. Mohawk Home includes a wide assortment of area rugs, accent rugs, bath rugs, utility mats, doormats and rug pads, perfect for customers to create a space that is a unique extension of their personality and taste. The intricately designed products are made for you with respect to current trends and the ideals of comfort and affordability. The vibrant and durable rugs use a technology that allows the use of multiple colors to create the spectacular rug design which is applicable to any high traffic areas in your home.
feature_bullets: VIBRANT FLORAL DESIGN: Colorful and bright, this vintage style floral medallion rug makes a perfect accent piece
DURABLE AND FADE RESISTANT: Holds up under high-traffic spaces with kids and pets. Easy to clean surface keeps it attractive for years to come
IDEAL FOR INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE: Perfect for the living room, bedroom, office or for outdoor patios
STAIN RESISTANT NYLON: Easy to clean with mild detergent and water
MADE IN THE USA: Proudly made in the USA with imported materials

specifications.Department: Mens, womens, boys, teen-boys, teen-girls, kids
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars708 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Taking proper care of your rug will prolong its life and appearance. Vacuum your rug regularly to remove loose soil, taking special care when vacuuming fringe and edges. Some throw rugs, especially for bathrooms, can be washed in your home washing machine. Always comply with the manufacturer\u2019s recommended cleaning methods on the attached label to prevent warranty invalidation and damage to your rug. Have a professional deep clean your rug as needed. Several cleaning methods will work, but to prevent rapid resoiling of your rug, it is important to completely remove any residual cleaning agents.
